SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw.menu

Class ConsoleMenuPrinter

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.menu.ConsoleMenuPrinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuPrinterInterface, PrinterInterface
public class ConsoleMenuPrinter extends Object implements MenuPrinterInterface
Implementation of MenuPrinterInterface for printing menu-related content to the console. Provides methods to print titles, choices, headings, and other messages with various stylings (e.g., bold, underline).
